components.hint:
If your complaint relates to Northampton County Court,
please select Yes below and click the continue button.


If your complaint relates to traffic enforcement, please select No and use the back (<back) link at the top of the page.
Type **County Court Bulk Centre in Northampton – Traffic Enforcement Centre** in the search field to select the correct court.


**Directing your complaint to the wrong court may cause unnecessary delay.**

items.label: Yes complaint relates to Northampton County Court

items.hint:
Please use the back (<back) link at the top of the page and type
**County Court Bulk Centre in Northampton – Traffic Enforcement Centre** in the
search field to select the correct court
items.label: No

components.legend: Please confirm the complaint relates to Northampton County Court
